content.rendered:
Custom 2022 Grey Cup Ticket Packages

It’s the grand finale of the Canadian football season and the whole country will be tuned in to see which team will earn bragging rights for the year. The CFL season is perennially entertaining and the excitement peaks with the league’s biggest contest: The Grey Cup. The big game promises to be a good time and we’d love to be your host at this truly Canadian event. Roadtrips’ 2022 Grey Cup packages include first-class accommodations in Regina, your choice of seating anywhere in Mosaic Stadium, and an onsite host to ensure you’re fully taken care of while you’re away from home. Complete 2022 Grey Cup packages are available now from $2,335 per person.

About the 2022 Grey Cup

The Grey Cup is the championship game of the Canadian Football League and is always the highlight of the season. This year’s Grey Cup will take place at Mosaic Stadium in Regina, Saskatchewan on November 20, 2022. Saskatchewan is known for their passionate fans and there’s no doubt Regina will put on an incredible event.
